title: What do you think of Zoe?
body: I have been playing Zoe non stop since release. Nearly at 100k mastery points :). I think she is the most fun champion to play and i have been playing league of legends for years. SO what do you think of Zoe playing her/against her i would love to know!!!     {{champion:142}}

replies.body:
Another classic CertainlyT design. Filled to the brim with cool features and extremely fun to play. But as with all Certainly T designs that is where the fun stop. Anyone who isn't the Zoe won't be having fun getting chunked to a third of their health from fog of war for the whole game.

Remember old Nidalee (or maybe you are new player) but Nidalee used to be able to do what Zoe does now and got completely reworked because Riot thought it was a toxic gameplay pattern. But apparently if CertainlyT makes it that means its fine.
